alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero and north central Las Animas Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Timpas, or 21 miles southwest of La Junta, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
